entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Terrace

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Airport 8:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -16.0°C
Wind: N 33 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind north 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
